name: Line3D.Builder
description: The `Line3D.Builder` class provides a fluent interface for creating `Line3D` instances with method chaining. It's the recommended way to create 3D lines with complex configurations or when you need to set multiple properties in a readable manner.
overview:
The `Line3D.Builder` class allows you to construct `Line3D` objects through a chain of method calls, making the configuration process more readable and maintainable. Instead of passing multiple parameters to constructors, you can set properties individually using descriptive method names.

The builder is typically obtained through the `Draw3D.addLine()` method and provides two final operations:
- `build()` - Creates the Line3D instance
- `buildAndAdd()` - Creates the Line3D instance and automatically adds it to the Draw3D context

methods.name: pos
methods.signature: pos(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2)
methods.description: Sets the start and end positions of the line in 3D space in a single call.

parameters.name: x1
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line start point

parameters.name: y1
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line start point

parameters.name: z1
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the line start point

parameters.name: x2
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line end point

parameters.name: y2
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line end point

parameters.name: z2
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the line end point

methods.name: pos1
methods.description: Sets the start position of the line in 3D space.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line start point

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line start point

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the line start point

methods.name: pos2
methods.description: Sets the end position of the line in 3D space.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line end point

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line end point

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the line end point

methods.name: x1
methods.description: Sets only the X coordinate of the line start point.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line start point

methods.name: y1
methods.description: Sets only the Y coordinate of the line start point.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line start point

methods.name: z1
methods.description: Sets only the Z coordinate of the line start point.

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the line start point

methods.name: x2
methods.description: Sets only the X coordinate of the line end point.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the line end point

methods.name: y2
methods.description: Sets only the Y coordinate of the line end point.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the line end point

methods.name: z2
methods.description: Sets only the Z coordinate of the line end point.

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the line end point

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the line color using RGB format with full alpha.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: RGB color value (0xRRGGBB)

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the line color using RGB format with custom alpha.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: RGB color value (0xRRGGBB)

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: Alpha transparency value (0-255)

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the line color using separate RGB values with full alpha.

parameters.name: r
parameters.description: Red component (0-255)

parameters.name: g
parameters.description: Green component (0-255)

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: Blue component (0-255)

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the line color using separate RGBA values.

parameters.name: r
parameters.description: Red component (0-255)

parameters.name: g
parameters.description: Green component (0-255)

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: Blue component (0-255)

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: Alpha component (0-255)

methods.name: alpha
methods.description: Sets only the alpha transparency value while preserving RGB color.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: Alpha transparency value (0-255)

methods.name: cull
methods.description: Sets whether the line should respect depth testing and be hidden behind blocks.

parameters.name: cullEnabled
parameters.description: true to enable face culling (respect depth), false to show through blocks

methods.name: build
methods.description: Creates the configured `Line3D` instance without adding it to the Draw3D context.

methods.name: buildAndAdd
methods.description: Creates the configured `Line3D` instance and automatically adds it to the Draw3D context.
examples:
const line = draw3D.addLine()
    .pos(0, 64, 0, 10, 70, 10)
    .color(0x00FF00)
    .buildAndAdd(); // Automatically added to Draw3D context
